title: Defending Your Kids is a Must ( Jhonni Blaze Interview)
itunes:title: Defending Your Kids is a Must ( Jhonni Blaze Interview)
description:
Today on the show we ran back our interview with Johnni Blaze where she spoke about mental health, songwriting, using her voice for more than music and more. Also, Charlamagne almost gave a Florida mother "Donkey of the Day" for putting hands on a child until he heard her side of the story and the thoughts from our loyal listeners on Breakfast Club court about the situtation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
